name: Spooky Ashes
text: We've ordered from here so many times cause it's very close by. It's pretty good. Orders are fulfilled in a timely manner and most of the food is great. The ingredients always seem to be quality. The pizza is decent but I'm not CRAZY for …More

name: Heather Nichols
text: Lesson learned. Today was my third attempt at ordering at this location. My first time it took two hours to deliver. The second time it took them an hour to call me to let me know they didn’t have any chicken to make my pizza. Then today I …More

name: Lauren Smith
text: Got there at noon, so the crew was busy ringing up orders, making orders, taking phone orders, and making a large banquet order. This was in addition to having two delivery trucks bringing in stock.The three crew members kept their cool and provided good service through it all. Good job!

name: Rick Criswell
text: I ordered a family special, or something of the sorts... basically a large "gourmet" pizza and a medium 1 topping. The medium 1 topping that I ordered (pepperoni) came burnt, first and foremost. I think it's slightly audacious that they'd …More

name: Joseph Cramer
text: DO NOT ORDER CALZONES!!!! I order from here regularly, and every other time except this one was bad. I ordered a calzone, cheese bread, and wings. Everything else is great do not order the calzones. I called to complain that it was burnt, …More

name: Kat Zelnio
text: Traveling through town for fuel and a local recommended this place... pulled up and was skeptical...but since it was the only place in town that was open, we went on in. Pizza was great!! Lots of interesting toppings! Very friendly upbeat service! Highly recommend it!

name: Average Joe
text: Convenient location. Awide variety of options regarding how you like your pizza. The Cajun butter crust has a bit of a bite to it. I'm definitely a regular.

name: James Sims
text: We ordered the xl all meat, was great pizza. Would have given 5 stars, but there was a cop there trying to decide if she was going to arrest a employee. Had my 15 year old son with me,  not the best atmosphere to be in at that time. But still giving 4 stars on quality of pizza, it was really good.

name: Aaron Tissue
text: A great place to stop for lunch. A group and I stopped every Friday for the lunch buffet being they are close to our place of work. The pizzas, breadsticks and salad bar are always fresh and delicious. The seating and tables are always …More

name: Megan Schwartz
text: Excellent service, especially after the location on KL in Kalamazoo treated us so poorly. The person taking our order was thorough and polite, and the delivery person was prompt and polite. Great service!

name: May Hall
text: Loved it!  Great pizza at good price!  Very helpful on the phone in ordering!

name: Linda Wiley
text: It was ready when I got there and hot, pleasant atmosphere hospitality was good. Got home the pizza crust was over cooked didn't return it the kids was hungry so they ate the toppings off and left the crust. No I didn't call the store my …More

name: Joshua Vandenberg
text: Best pizza in kalamazoo with a large menu and affordable prices, I would recommend this to anyone!

name: Scott Congdon
text: Here is the place for meat ball subs with extra cheese , great pizza great too

name: Gen H.
text: Thanks Cottage Inn on Sprinkle Rd! They helped us feed a group of 40 - really good pizza and salad. The GF pizzas were tasty too. Thanks again!

name: Christine Ware
text: While the food quality isn't bad, the lack of customer service is unacceptable. The store repeatedly messed up my orders and when I tried to get them to fix their errors the "manager" (a 19yr old girl with a serious attitude problem) acted as though I were trying to con the store out of free food.

name: Kerry Santana Pletcher
text: The pizza was great, but they over charged my card. My total was 16.49 and my card was charged 19.54 so check you total against your bank statement...

name: Sande S.
text: I've never had a problem in my orders. Every thing has been pretty much great!  Even when we have had a meeting for our trailer park, the pizza's have been fantastic and LOADS of cheerse!!! And hot and I appreciate that. I will order again. I may not do so often but I will order again. God Bless.

name: Shawna Mock
text: Love this place and their crusts. Great coupons

name: Vance McClenton
text: The pizza was good, but definitely take it out or get it delivered...

text: This is my favorite pizza joint! My problem with other places is that their sausage is gross, but not cottage inn! Thank you for making such delicious pizza!

name: Jenelle Stewart
text: Very clean and friendly atmosphere!  Great food!  Will be returning.

name: Benjamis Prime
text: Tables are sticky at least it's a group of decent people that enjoy having fun with each other while working.

name: Paul Dearing
text: The Kalamazoo area has a few well known and good pizza restaurants.  But Cottage Inn is our go-to choice, and where we go most often.  Pizzas and service are consistantly good.  Staff is hard-working and good at what they do.

name: randa luster
text: Great Chicken Alfredo pizza and it's ready in no time!

name: Toddly
text: Try the Chicken Alfredo Pizza, it's a special order now, but it's SOOOOO worth the wait. Mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm!!!

name: Kimberly Wright
text: Always fresh pizza and friendly staff. Even go as far as bringing it to my car while I'm waiting. Bathrooms always clean and inviting.

name: Helen Rawson
text: We love there sauce and crust one my faves

name: Christian Quada
text: Counter guy was nice. I was about an hour before they closed but they were more interested in closing than taking care of me. All the TVs they have or shut off
